__info__: production and development elements define configs that are easy to switch between using command line arguments used with api.py

production.__info__: This config is targeting a Docker container deployment

development.__info__: This config is good for runnin the app natively, without a container

hsds.__info__: These credentials are for demo, rate-limited usage.

html_home:
DW-TAP Project's API Endpoint

This endpoint supports the following requests:

GET /v1/timeseries/windspeed?height=50m&lat=40.7128&lon=-74.0059&start_date=20100302&stop_date=20120101&vertical_interpolation=linear&spatial_interpolation=idw

OR

GET /v1/timeseries/winddirection?height=67.00m&lat=40.7888&lon=-74.0059&start_date=20110302&stop_date=20110303
